short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily export your watch history, favorites, and lists from TV Time. Perfect for backup, migration, or analysis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your TV Time data!  This extension allows you to easily export your watch history, favorites, and lists from TV Time, even without a public API. Perfect for backup, migration, or analysis.

Simply go to TV Time, open the extension and Liberate!
